title: Eagle Brand Lemon Cream Pie Recipe
description: Eagle Brand lemon pie is easy to make with a graham cracker crust, condensed milk, egg yolks, lemon, and whipped cream for a luscious lemon dessert.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Trusted Brands: Recipes and Tips EAGLE BRAND® Eagle Brand Lemon Cream Pie 4.6 (45) 35 Reviews 9 Photos This Eagle Brand lemon pie is deliciously rich with a burst of lemon flavor in every bite! Submitted by Eagle brand Updated on November 21, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 9 9 9 9 Prep Time: 15 mins Cook Time: 30 mins Additional Time: 4 hrs Total Time: 4 hrs 45 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 3 large egg yolks 1 (14 ounce) can Eagle Brand® Sweetened Condensed Milk ½ cup Santa Cruz Organic® Pure Lemon Juice 1 (9 inch) prepared graham cracker or baked pie crust Frozen whipped topping, thawed or whipped cream ¼ teaspoon Grated lemon peel (Optional) Directions Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Place egg yolks in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add sweetened condensed milk and lemon juice; beat until combined. Pour filling into prepared crust. Bake in the preheated oven until set, 30 to 35 minutes. Remove from oven and cool at room temperature for 1 hour. Transfer pie to the refrigerator and chill for at least 3 hours. Spread whipped topping or whipped cream over pie before serving. Garnish with lemon peel, if desired. I Made It Print 145 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 410 Calories 16g Fat 37g Carbs 4g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 410 % Daily Value * Total Fat 16g 20% Saturated Fat 7g 34% Cholesterol 94mg 31% Sodium 245mg 11% Total Carbohydrate 37g 13% Dietary Fiber 1g 2% Total Sugars 28g Protein 4g 9% Vitamin C 0mg 0% Calcium 15mg 1% Iron 1mg 4% Potassium 49mg 1% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Eagle Brand Lemon Cream Pie 01 of 09 Photo by  Allrecipes Member 02 of 09 Photo by  Grandad 01/03/2021 03 of 09 Photo by  Karen Riddle Wakefield 07/13/2020 My family has been making this recipe for close to 40 years now! So good & so easy!! Very similar to Key Lime pie. 04 of 09 Photo by  Big Poppa 10/06/2019 Added 2tsp of zest to the filling... And baked it for 18min 05 of 09 Photo by  ReadMyLips26 09/28/2014 This was really good! I used fresh lemon juice and the rind of two lemons. Came out very nice. Just enough tang. And very easy. Everyone loved it. 06 of 09 Photo by  Jessica Geriene 04/20/2014 07 of 09 Photo by  Jessica Geriene 04/20/2014 08 of 09 Photo by  naples34102 08/15/2013 A delicious lemon version of Key Lime Pie and just as delicious. Just a couple of tips – beat your egg yolks until thick and lemon-colored. Add 1-1/2 tsp. of grated zest (I also used fresh lemon juice). Baking this for 30-35 minutes is not necessary and may even be too long - 15 minutes is just fine. I also used my own graham cracker crust: 1-1/4 c. graham cracker crumbs, 2 T. sugar and 5 T. butter, melted. Pat into pie dish and bake at 350 degrees, 7-9 minutes. 1 You’ll Also Love Sweet Potato Pie from Eagle Brand 101 Ratings Caramel Apple Walnut Pie 23 Ratings Classic Key Lime Pie 133 Ratings Kraft® Triple-Layer Lemon Pie 24 Ratings Pink Lemonade Pie from Eagle Brand 11 Ratings Banana Coconut Cream Pie 53 Ratings Caramel Apple Streusel Squares 9 Ratings Eagle Brand Chocolate Fondue 195 Ratings Caramel Flans from EAGLE BRAND 11 Ratings Lemon Pie without Condensed Milk 1 Rating Chocolate Peanut Butter Ice Cream Sandwich Dessert 3 Ratings Seven Layer Cookie Bars 271 Ratings Chocolate Peanut Butter Swirl Fudge 54 Ratings Caramel Apple Ice Cream 7 Ratings Easy Creamy Banana Pudding 190 Ratings Blueberry Streusel Cobbler 109 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Eagle brand
instructions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Place egg yolks in a large bowl; beat with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy. Add sweetened condensed milk and lemon juice; beat until combined. Pour filling into prepared crust.;Bake in the preheated oven until set, 30 to 35 minutes. Remove from oven and cool at room temperature for 1 hour. Transfer pie to the refrigerator and chill for at least 3 hours.;Spread whipped topping or whipped cream over pie before serving. Garnish with lemon peel, if desired.
